languages.text: {n}Губернатор склоняет голову в согласии.{/n} "Разумеется, Ваша Светлость. Ущерб будет вам компенсирован. И я лично прослежу, чтобы трюмы вашего корабля наполнились лучшими товарами из моих личных запасов".

{n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for any losses. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the finest goods from my personal reserves."
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор склоняет голову в согласии.{/n} "Разумеется, Ваша Светлость. Ущерб будет вам компенсирован. И я лично прослежу, чтобы трюмы вашего корабля наполнились лучшими товарами из моих личных запасов".

traits.locale_text: {n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for your damage. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the best goods from my personal reserve."

{n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for your damage. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the best goods from my personal reserve."

{n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for the damages. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the finest goods from my personal reserves."

{n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for the damages. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the finest goods from my personal reserves."

{n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for any losses. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the finest goods from my personal reserves."

{n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for any losses. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the finest goods from my personal reserves."

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur neigt den Kopf.{/n} "Natürlich, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ihr werdet entschädigt. Und ich sorge persönlich dafür, dass die Lagerräume Eures Schiffs mit den besten Waren aus meinen persönlichen Vorräten gefüllt werden."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for any losses. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the finest goods from my personal reserves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur neigt den Kopf.{/n} "Natürlich, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ihr werdet entschädigt. Und ich sorge persönlich dafür, dass die Lagerräume Eures Schiffs mit den besten Waren aus meinen persönlichen Vorräten gefüllt werden."

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur incline la tête en signe d'acceptation.{/n} « Entendu, Votre Seigneurie. Vous recevrez une compensation pour les pertes subies. Et je veillerai personnellement à ce que les cales de votre vaisseau soient remplies des meilleurs produits provenant de mes réserves personnelles. »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for any losses. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the finest goods from my personal reserves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur incline la tête en signe d'acceptation.{/n} « Naturellement, Votre Seigneurie. Vous recevrez une compensation pour les dégâts subis. Et je veillerai personnellement à ce que les cales de votre vaisseau soient remplies des meilleurs produits provenant de mes réserves personnelles. »

languages.text: {n}总督顺从地低下了头。{/n}“当然，大人，您会得到补偿的。我保证，我会用我个人最好的藏品，装满您船上的货舱。”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for any losses. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the finest goods from my personal reserves."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督低下头，表示同意。{/n}“当然，大人，您会得到补偿的。我保证，我会用我个人最好的储藏货物，装满您船上的货舱。”

languages.text: {n}総督は首を縦に振って承諾する。{/n}「もちろんだ、陛下。損害は補償する。それから、私個人が保管しているものから最高級の品々を、あなたの船倉にたっぷり送るよう、私が個人的に引き受けよう」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for any losses. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the finest goods from my personal reserves."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は首を縦に振って承諾する。{/n}「もちろんだ、陛下。損害は補償する。それから、私個人が保管しているものから最高級の品々を、あなたの船倉にたっぷり送るよう、私が個人的に引き受けよう」

languages.text: {n}El gobernador inclina la cabeza en señal de aceptación.{/n} «Por supuesto, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Se le indemnizará por cualquier pérdida. Y me encargaré personalmente de que las bodegas de su nave se llenen con los mejores productos de mis reservas personales».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for any losses. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the finest goods from my personal reserves."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador inclina la cabeza en señal de aceptación.{/n}«Por supuesto, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Se le indemnizará por los daños y perjuicios. Y me encargaré personalmente de que las bodegas de su barco se llenen con los mejores productos de mis reservas personales».

languages.text: {n}Vali, kabullenmeyle başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "Tabii ki {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Tüm kayıplarınız karşılanacaktır. Ayrıca geminizin ambarlarının şahsi stokumdan en kaliteli mallarla doldurulmasıyla bizzat alakadar olacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor bows his head in acceptance.{/n} "Of course, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You will be compensated for any losses. And I'll see to it personally that your ship's holds are filled with the finest goods from my personal reserves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali, kabullenmeyle başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "Tabii ki {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Tüm kayıplarınız karşılanacaktır. Ayrıca geminizin ambarlarının şahsi stokumdan en kaliteli mallarla doldurulmasıyla bizzat alakadar olacağım."
